ASME BPVC.II.A-2025 SA-439 /SA-439M 
SPECIFICATION FOR AUSTENITIC DUCTILE IRON 
CASTINGS 
SA-439 /SA-439M 
(Identical with ASTM Specification A439 / A439M-18 except for repair by welding and plugging is :not permitted, and 
certification made mandatory.)
